text:
@JoeNBC The Pentagon and intelligence community have repeatly denied any warning about a Coronavirus epidemic.
The NCMI does not comment publicly on itelligence matters and the media fake news citing unnamed sources is denied by the NCMI said Col. R Shane, director of the NCMI.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The Pentagon
entity.description: Headquarters of the United States Department of Defense, the Pentagon
